citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
Four adult coatis have tails that have significant patchy hair loss affecting one quarter to half of their tails. One white
female adult coati has a very small sharp white point on the end of her tail that may be bone. While the licensee has a
treatment from the Attending Veterinarian on hand, at the time of the inspection she had not started using this treatment
for the animals in accordance with the AV's instructions.
Hair loss can be a sign of allergies, skin infection, or overgrooming. Areas of hair loss may be itchy or uncomfortable for
the animal. Correct by 3/13/24 by communicating with the Attending Veterinarian regarding the current condition of these
animals and following his instructions for their treatment and care.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
Additional Inspectors:
COURTNEY JERNIGAN, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

narrative:
2.40(b)(2) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
Four adult coatis have tails that have significant patchy hair loss affecting one quarter to half of their tails. One white 
female adult coati has a very small sharp white point on the end of her tail that may be bone. While the licensee has a 
treatment from the Attending Veterinarian on hand, at the time of the inspection she had not started using this treatment 
for the animals in accordance with the AV's instructions.  
Hair loss can be a sign of allergies, skin infection, or overgrooming. Areas of hair loss may be itchy or uncomfortable for 
the animal. Correct by 3/13/24 by communicating with the Attending Veterinarian regarding the current condition of these 
animals and following his instructions for their treatment and care. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.

COURTNEY JERNIGAN, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n
